reviewText: this video was extremely helpful in our situation. my husband died in december of 2011, and i have two children age 11 and 12. i watched it several times and will watch it again. it gave me some thoughts and ideas on how to help my children ( and myself) go through the grieving process, and know that it is okay to cry, okay and expected that there will be good days and horrible days, but we have the strength to survive. paula d'arcy speaks plainly and will continue to help with our day to day issues. i had originally found this at our library, then ordered my own copy to refer to and pass along to another family who may need it.
